title: From phenotypic chaos to neurobiological order
author: brainreaders
content: Complex demographic and behavioral phenotypes can arise from coordinated interactions among brain systems. A single axis of co-variation spanning 'negative' and 'positive' attributes links diverse participant characteristics with […]

title: Thalamus controls recurrent cortical dynamics
author: brainreaders
content: Previous work has suggested that cortical recurrent circuits can self-sustain their activity without thalamic input. A study now demonstrates that this is not the case in the awake […]
